text: Uhī hō jasalē ākāśaharū ra pr̥thvīlā'ī chaḥ (6) dinamā sr̥ṣṭi garyō ani sinhāsanamāthi ucca bhayō. Ū jāndacha jē jati dharatīmā pravēśa gardacha ra jē–jati usabāṭa niskancha, ra jē–jati ākāśabāṭa avatarita huncha ra jē–jati usamā caḍhdacha. Ra timī jahām̐sukai bha'ē pani ū timrō sāthamā cha ra allāha dēkhdacha, jē–jati timīlē gardachau
